name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: Proficient in **.NET**, **.NET Core**, **MS SQL Server**, **T-SQL**, and **REST APIs**, I am a highly experienced Senior Software Developer with 8+ years in software engineering. My expertise includes Agile and Scrum methodologies, ensuring full SDLC compliance while delivering high-performance solutions across various sectors. I've effectively utilized **SharePoint** for development and support, implementing responsive UI through **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, as well as frameworks like **React**. With strong capabilities in **Azure DevOps** and CI/CD practices, I ensure streamlined deployment and integration processes. My original strengths include developing secure and modern applications, applying microservices architecture and leveraging cloud platforms like **Azure** for reliability and performance optimization.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies to manage software projects from initiation through completion, ensuring timely and efficient delivery.
Developed and maintained **REST APIs** and **HTTP APIs** to enhance interoperability within software applications, supporting features for both web and mobile platforms.
Implemented and supported **SharePoint** solutions, contributing to enhanced collaboration and document management for cross-functional teams.
Engaged in the full software development lifecycle (SDLC), applying best practices to ensure quality and reliability of software products.
Created responsive user interfaces using **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **React** to deliver seamless experiences across various devices and platforms.
Developed backend services using **.NET** and **.NET Core**, ensuring robust and scalable solutions tailored for business needs.
Collaborated in the design and implementation of database solutions using **MS SQL Server** and **T-SQL**, optimizing performance for data-intensive applications.
Designed and implemented **GraphQL** services to provide a flexible and efficient way for clients to query needed data from the server.
Contributed to CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps** to automate software builds, testing, and deployments across multiple environments, achieving over **90% automation** in deployment processes.
Participated in the creation of UML diagrams to effectively communicate design strategies and architecture to stakeholders.
Employed modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries, ensuring compatibility with **TypeScript** to enhance code maintainability and scalability.
Advocated for best practices in **Responsive UI** development, ensuring applications deliver a consistent experience regardless of device or screen size.
Leveraged **Azure DevOps** for managing source code and implementing version control, streamlining team collaboration processes.
Conducted code reviews and contributed to knowledge sharing within the team, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

• Developed and supported **.NET** and **.NET Core** applications, participating in the full Software Development Life Cycle (**SDLC**) to ensure high-quality delivery within Agile and Scrum methodologies.
• Created and maintained **REST APIs** and **HTTP APIs**, utilizing **MS SQL Server** and **T-SQL** to optimize database interactions for enhanced performance and reliability.
• Designed responsive user interfaces using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, with a focus on integrating **React** for seamless user experiences across platforms.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Azure DevOps** for automated deployment and quality assurance, streamlining the development process.
• Collaborated in a cross-functional team, contributing to project planning and progress tracking using **Agile** techniques, ensuring adherence to timelines and project specifications.
• Conducted rigorous testing and debugging processes to enhance application performance and reliability, including automated unit and integration testing.
• Participated in SharePoint development/support, enhancing collaboration tools for effective teamwork and document management.
• Collaborated with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications using **UML** diagrams for clear communication and project alignment.
• Maintained and improved existing applications by refactoring code and implementing new features based on user feedback and performance metrics.
• Engaged in continuous learning and professional development to stay updated with the latest technologies and industry trends.

Led the development and optimization of REST APIs for critical applications, ensuring adherence to **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies, which improved collaboration and project delivery timelines by **30%**.
Implemented and supported full software development lifecycle (SDLC) processes in projects leveraging **.NET** and **.NET Core**, successfully deploying **20+** applications over **12 months**.
Employed **MS SQL Server** and T-SQL to manage and optimize databases, achieving a **40%** increase in query performance and reducing downtime.
Designed and executed CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps**, incorporating **Git** for version control, allowing for rapid, reliable deployments with a **99.9%** success rate.
Developed responsive UI components using **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, integrated with **React** to enhance user engagement and achieved **95%** user satisfaction in feedback surveys.
Created comprehensive documentation and UML diagrams for application architectures and processes, facilitating better understanding and knowledge transfer among team members.
Supported project goals through effective performance monitoring and debugging of applications built on **HTTP APIs** and **GraphQL**, enabling a significant improvement in response times.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure the development of high-quality software solutions, leveraging strengths in **SharePoint** development and support to enhance team productivity and project outcomes.

skills:
**Programming Languages:**
	Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, T-SQL, HTML, CSS

**Backend Frameworks:**
	FastAPI, Django, Flask, Spring Boot, .NET, .NET Core, REST APIs, WCF, HTTP APIs, GraphQL

**Frontend Frameworks:**
	React (15–18), Angular (1–16), Next.js, Vue.js (2/3), Responsive UI

**API Technologies:**
	REST & gRPC APIs, JWT, OAuth2

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS (ECS, Lambda), Azure (App Services)

**Databases:**
	PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MS SQL Server, MongoDB (Gaming), Redis

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, Azure DevOps, CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS (RDS, S3), Azure (Blob, SQL)

**Other:**
	Agile, Scrum, Full SDLC, SharePoint development/support, UML
